errors.name: UnicodeError
errors.description: Raised when a Unicode-related encoding or decoding error occurs.

errors.name: UnicodeEncodeError
errors.description: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during encoding.

errors.name: UnicodeDecodeError
errors.description: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during decoding.

errors.name: UnicodeTranslateError
errors.description: Raised when a Unicode-related error occurs during translation.

errors.name: ValueError
errors.description: Raised when a function gets an argument of correct type but improper value.

errors.name: EOFError
errors.description: Raised when the input() function hits the end-of-file condition.

errors.name: ZeroDivisionError
errors.description: Raised when the second operand of a division or module operation is zero.

errors.name: FloatingPointError
errors.description: Raised when a floating point operation fails.

errors.name: ImportError
errors.description: Raised when the imported module is not found.

errors.name: OverflowError
errors.description: Raised when the result of an arithmetic operation is too large to be represented.

errors.name: ReferenceError
errors.description: Raised when a weak reference proxy is used to access a garbage collected referent.

errors.name: KeyError
errors.description: Raised when a key is not found in a dictionary.

errors.name: RuntimeError
errors.description: Raised when an error does not fall under any other category.

errors.name: MemoryError
errors.description: Raised when an operation runs out of memory.

errors.name: GeneratorExit
errors.description: Raised when a generators close() method is called.

errors.name: KeyboardInterrupt
errors.description: Raised when the user hits the interrupt key(Ctrl+c or delete).

errors.name: OSError
errors.description: Raised when a system operation causes a system-related error.

errors.name: NotImplementedError
errors.description: Raised by abstract methods.

errors.name: StopIteration
errors.description: Raised by the next() function to indicate that there is no further item to be returned by the iterator.

errors.name: NameError
errors.description: Raised when a variable is not found in the local or global scope.

errors.name: SyntaxError
errors.description: Raised by the parser when a syntax error is encountered.

errors.name: IndentationError
errors.description: Raised when there is an incorrect indentation.

errors.name: IndexError
errors.description: Raised when the index of a sequence is out of range.

errors.name: TabError
errors.description: Raised when the indentation consists of inconsistent tabs and spaces.

errors.name: SystemError
errors.description: Raised when the interpreter detects internal error.

errors.name: AttributeError
errors.description: Raised on the attribute assignment or reference fails.

errors.name: SystemExit
errors.description: Raised by the sys.exit() function.

errors.name: TypeError
errors.description: Raised when a function or operation is applied to an object of an incorrect type.

errors.name: UnboundLocalError
errors.description: Raised when a reference is made to a local variable in a function or method, but no value has been bound to that variable.

errors.name: AssertionError
errors.description: Raised when the assert statement fails.
